page.title: 10Children's Games,Bitteswell
page.content:
{VETS (cont.):}Coming from the top there is some ivy which we use as smelling salts.We use sticks,leaves etc. for tools.Across the animal chair is a branch which you lock the person in.three people can play being either the vet,assistant or the animal.
{DRAGONS CAVE:}There is a corner of our playground which is made of a cloakroom and kitchen.this is the Dragons Cave.An even amount of people can play.A pair is on and the others try to set their friend free.If a pair is caught they swop with the catchers and the game carries on.
{YETTY:}This game is played around our shed.Three people play,one is Yetty who stands along one side of the shed,and the others are explorers. { (continued on the next page)
